org.opentosca.toscana.core.transformation

Interface TransformationDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransformationFilesystemDao

    public interface TransformationDao
    Data Access Object for Transformation objects.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • create

        Transformation create(Csar csar,
                      Platform platform)
               throws PlatformNotFoundException
        Creates a new transformation for given csar and platform. If a transformation with this csar and platform already exists, also deletes the old transformation.
        Parameters:
        csar - the csar on which the new transformation will be based on
        platform - the target platform of the new transformation
        Returns:
        the new transformation
        Throws:
        PlatformNotFoundException - if given platform is not supported by any known plugin

      • delete

        void delete(Transformation transformation)
        Deletes given transformation

      • find

        java.util.Optional<Transformation> find(Csar csar,
                                        Platform platform)
        Returns an optional transformation object which matches given csar and platform

      • find

        java.util.List<Transformation> find(Csar csar)
        Returns all transformation objects which match given csar

      • getRootDir

        java.io.File getRootDir(Transformation transformation)
        Returns:
        the root directory of given transformation

      • getContentDir

        java.io.File getContentDir(Transformation transformation)
        Returns:
        the content directory of given transformation

      • createTargetArtifact

        TargetArtifact createTargetArtifact(Transformation transformation)
                             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Returns the output stream for given transformation
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • setCsarDao

        void setCsarDao(CsarDao csarDao)
        Do not call. Used for internal initialization
